Method Detail

fireEvent

public static void fireEvent(java.lang.String event,
                             int x,
                             int y,
                             int button,
                             int nb_click,
                             Task task)
Fires a mouse event on a DOM element and runs a task after that the event is executed.

Parameters:
event - The type for the mouse event without the prefix "on" : EVENT_CLICK, EVENT_MOUSEMOVE
x - the x coordinate of the mouse
y - the y coordinate of the mouse
button - the button of the mouse to use, MOUSE_BUTTON_1, MOUSE_BUTTON_2,MOUSE_BUTTON_3
nb_click - the number of click to do
task - the task to run after the event. can be null

getElement

public static com.google.gwt.user.client.Element getElement(int x,
                                                            int y)
Returns the DOM element at the specific position

Parameters:
x - the x coordinate for the element
y - the y coordinate for the element
Returns:
the element at the position (x,y) or the element of the RootPanel if not found
